name: Knife at the Museum
description:
Knife at the Museum is a top down investigation game. You find yourself in a museum, however there's no time to stop and enjoy the cat shark everyone's raving about! You're on a mission! And using a variety of tools the goal is to identify the target amongst regular civilians and assassins who are after your target as well. Only you can save the target and escort them out of the museum! Good Luck!

Controls:

WASD  - move

Right click - Aim / get weapon ready

Left click - Use Weapon

Space - roll
